      • imgDump

        public static void imgDump(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                           java.lang.String suffix,
                           int timestamp,
                           java.lang.String outputPath)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        outputPath - The folder to dump images to
        timestamp - The timestamp to append to the dumped image filename
        image - The image to be dumped
        suffix - The suffix to put on the file name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the image failed to write

        Returns:

      • matToBufferedImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage matToBufferedImage(org.opencv.core.Mat matrix)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Converts a OpenCV Matrix to a BufferedImage :)
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix to be converted
        Returns:
        The image generated from the matrix
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This should never happen but ImageIO requires it to be thrown
